text_logic_form: Find the area of the parallelogram.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the area of the parallelogram $ACBS$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $CB$ is $40$ units.
The length of the line $SD$ is $28$ units.
The length of the line $DB$ is $38$ units.
Point $S$ lies on the line connecting $A$ and $D$.
The line $BD$ is perpendicular to the line $DS$.
line_instances: There are lines $AC$, $AD$, $AS$, forming a triangle $ACD$.
There are lines $BD$, $CB$, $SB$, $SD$, forming a quadrilateral $BCDS$.
